description: I’m a senior news assistant on The Times’s Culture desk. Here are five things I've been watching, reading and listening to lately.
title: What’s in Our Queue? ‘Life on Earth’ and More
title_page: What’s in Our Queue? ‘Life on Earth’ and More - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s in Our Queue? ‘Life on Earth’ and More Gabe Cohn Physically in Brooklyn, mentally here: ⛰
I’m a senior news assistant on The Times’s Culture desk. I’m emerging from the omicron surge more intentional about nights out. (Wired: concerts, movies, plays. Tired: post-show drinks that cost as much as the ticket.)
Here are five things I’ve been watching, reading and listening to →
